CHANGES
*******


1.5 (2014-02-13)
================

- Version bump (see http://www.heise.de/extras/socialshareprivacy/#changelog)


1.3-2 (2013-11-05)
==================

- Use SSL to access assets. (nidi)


1.3-1 (2013-02-20)
==================

- Parse cookies with JavaScript, not JSON. (phihag)


1.3
===

- Initial release. (csenger)
